about_the_game:
You wake up in an unfamiliar house with no memory of who you are, and it appears that "you" have already died. However, you discover you can communicate with the items in the room! They call you "Ringmaster," and each item has its own rich inner world, each with its own issues that need your solving...

In the fantastical world of Dreams of Things, try stepping into the inner worlds of household items like shower curtains, mirrors, and chandeliers, solving their problems to gain clues about your origins and the secrets this world holds. What ultimately awaits you at the end of your journey? Come and explore!

Game Features:

  • Explore this cartoon-style fantasy world from a first-person perspective.

  • Over ten puzzle spaces where you use lasers, mechanisms, and a bit of imagination to solve challenges.

  • Characters with distinct personalities will unveil the secrets hidden in this world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800) or equivalent / AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670, GeForce GTX 200 series with at least 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device

short_description: Dream of Things is an adventure puzzle game packed with mystery. You had died in a bathtub and acquired the ability to talk to inanimate things. You need to enter their dreams to help them fulfill their wishes and figure out what happened.
